name: visibility-state-listener
description: Cross-browser document visibility state detection library. Detects if user has switched to another window/tab or not.

scripts.build: npm run build-minified && npm run build-umd && npm run build-umd-polyfilled
scripts.build-umd-polyfilled: mkdir -p dist/umd-polyfilled && mkdir -p ./source-compiled && BABEL_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./source -d ./source-compiled && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -s createVisibilityStateListener ./source-compiled/index.js -o ./dist/umd-polyfilled/index.js && ./node_modules/.bin/minify ./dist/umd-polyfilled/index.js --out-file ./dist/umd-polyfilled/index.js && rm -rf ./source-compiled
